p: Male Kunming mice (31.1 ± 2.2 g, 8 weeks old) were obtained from Shandong University Animal Services (Shandong, China). The mice were housed under standard laboratory conditions of temperature (24 ± 1 °C), humidity (50 ± 5%), and light (12 h light/dark cycle). The animals were allowed free access to food and water. All the procedures were approved by the Shandong University Animal Care and Use Committee and carried out in compliance with the National Institutes of Health guidelines for the care and use of laboratory animals (Publication No. 85-23, revised 1985).
